verses.roman:
pūrve yabe mahāprabhu calilā dakṣiṇe
pratāparudra rājā tabe bolāila sārvabhaume

synonyms: pūrve—formerly; yabe—when; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; calilā—departed; dakṣiṇe—for His South Indian tour; pratāparudra—Pratāparudra; rājā—the King; tabe—at that time; bolāila—called for; sārvabhaume—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu departed for South India, King Pratāparudra called Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya to his palace.
